name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Apple TV Extended: boost your viewing

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your Apple TV viewing experience: adjust speed, skip intros & recaps, hide spoilers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension offers many tools to help you watch your favorite Apple TV+ videos even better!

Be in the driver's seat of your viewing experience! AppleTV+ Extended is a great tool that unifies multiple functionalities in one easy-to-use extension and gives you more control over the AppleTV+ platform. 

Now you're able to:
‚è© Speed up or slow down your playback speed
‚è≠Ô∏è Automatically skip recaps, intros, and go to the next episode
üîÅ Rotate and zoom the video
üé® Customize subtitle style
üì∫ Watch video content in a picture in picture mode

In order to use the extension you need to hover over one of two status icons that you can find in the top right corner of home page or bottom left corner of the player, depending on where you are. Then click on the gear icon and control panel will appear, giving you access to all of extension features.

All you need to do is add the AppleTV+ Extended extension to your browser, choose from available options in the control panel, and enjoy watching content tailored to your personal viewing preferences. It's as simple as that

Disclaimer : AppleTV+ is a trademark of Apple Inc. This website & extension hold no association or affiliation with AppleTV+ or any third-party companies.
